pr_title: Adds support for order_by and order search parameters.

timeline.bodyText: Minor: Can you bring the closing ) to follow directly after orderBy?
timeline.author: awoods

timeline.bodyText:
There are two valid values for the order field: asc and desc.
What is the purpose of listing all of the potential fields? ...likely should be removed.
timeline.author: awoods

timeline.bodyText:
Likely want to add a separator, such as:
StringUtils.join(Condition.Field.values(), ", "));
timeline.author: awoods

timeline.bodyText:
Since this test is named to be testing the "default" ordering, I would suggest removing the order_by and order query parameters... and rely on the defaults.
A new, separate test could be useful to test desc order.
timeline.author: awoods

timeline.message:
Adds support for order_by and order search parameters.
Resolves: https://jira.lyrasis.org/browse/FCREPO-3343
